explanations.clustering: The paper mentions the use of subtractive clustering method to generate fuzzy rules, which is a clustering technique.
explanations.neural network: The paper compares the fuzzy inference system (FIS) model with an artificial neural network (ANN) model, indicating the relevance of neural networks.
explanations.regression: The paper also compares the FIS model with a multivariate regression (MVR) model, showing the relevance of regression techniques.
